name: Enchanted Diamond, LLC
about: At Enchanted Diamond, LLC, we are a team of experienced pilots with over 35,000 combined hours of flight time, dedicated to providing high-altitude flight training in Santa Fe, NM. Our instructors, including Master Instructors, offer personalized training to accommodate each student's learning style. We operate reliable and safe aircraft, including the DA40, and provide flexible payment plans with no initial investment required. Our comprehensive training includes ground and flight instruction, as well as preparation for the FAA written test. With a focus on safety and adherence to FAA rules, we aim to help you achieve your aviation dreams while enjoying the unique landscapes of New Mexico. Join us to elevate your flying experience and make your aviation goals a reality.
